tool_description: Designed to show relevant news about cybersecurity vendor, Sophos.
name: Sophos News
title: Sophos News

api_list.name: Specific news provider.
api_list.description: Returns Sophos related stories from a specific provider.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sophos-news.p.rapidapi.com/sophos/Naked Security"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sophos-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sophos-news.p.rapidapi.com/sophos/{newsproviderid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sophos-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Sophos news.
api_list.description: Will return all news stories from all news providers, Sophos included.
api_list.code:
